Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CalibPluginThe Refresh Rate Calibration plugin. Calibrates screen refresh rate. Used on Linux only
CheckerFlickerA class for drawing randomly-generated 'checkers' of arbitrary width and height to the GLWindow
ConnectionThreadA Class that encapsulates a single client connection
ConsoleWindowThis class encapsulates the console window that the user sees in the GUI

Util::ErrorStream-like class to print an error message to the app's console window Example:

FrameCreatorClass that encapsulates the frame creation thread(s) of CheckerFlicker
GLWindowThe main Open GL display window
GridPluginAbstract class for plugins wishing to have access to a 'grid' for drawing
Util::LogSuper class of Debug, Warning, Error classes
MovingGratingA plugin that draws a moving 'grating' or set of bars
MovingObjectsA plugin that draws an moving target
ReentrancyPreventerA helper class that helps prevent reentrancy into certain functions
RNGA class to generate random numbers
Util::StatusStream-like class to print a message to the app's status bar
StimAppThe central class to the program that more-or-less encapsulates most objects and data in the program
StimParamsEncapsulates the parameters for a StimPlugin
